statements: SELECT * FROM patient_demographics;
SELECT first_name, last_name, gender FROM patient_demographics WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT first_name, last_name, date_of_birth FROM patient_demographics ORDER BY date_of_birth DESC;
SELECT city, state, zip_code FROM patient_demographics WHERE city = 'New York';
SELECT patient_id, first_name, last_name, address, city, state FROM patient_demographics WHERE state = 'California';
SELECT * FROM patient_demographics WHERE gender = 'Female';
SELECT first_name, last_name, city FROM patient_demographics WHERE state = 'California';
SELECT patient_id, first_name, last_name, address, city, state FROM patient_demographics WHERE state = 'New York' ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT last_name, first_name, date_of_birth FROM patient_demographics WHERE zip_code = '10001' ORDER BY date_of_birth DESC;
SELECT patient_id, first_name, last_name, city, zip_code FROM patient_demographics WHERE city = 'Los Angeles' AND gender = 'Male';
SELECT * FROM Patients;
SELECT patient_name, patient_age FROM Patients WHERE patient_gender = 'Female';
SELECT patient_name, patient_age, patient_gender FROM Patients WHERE patient_age > 50;
SELECT * FROM MedicalRecords ORDER BY record_date DESC;
SELECT patient_name, diagnosis, prescription FROM Patients JOIN MedicalRecords ON Patients.patient_id = MedicalRecords.patient_id WHERE diagnosis IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM Patients;
SELECT patient_name, patient_age FROM Patients WHERE patient_gender = 'Female';
SELECT record_id, diagnosis, prescription FROM MedicalRecords WHERE record_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31';

SELECT patient_name, medication_name, medication_description FROM Patients JOIN MedicalRecords ON Patients.patient_id = MedicalRecords.patient_id JOIN Medications ON MedicalRecords.record_id = Medications.medication_id;
SELECT patient_name, patient_age, patient_blood_type FROM Patients WHERE patient_age >= 50 ORDER BY patient_age DESC;
SELECT * FROM Patients ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT first_name, last_name, gender FROM Patients WHERE gender = 'M';
SELECT * FROM MedicalRecords WHERE diagnosis = 'COVID-19' ORDER BY date_created DESC;
SELECT doctor_id, first_name, last_name, specialty FROM Doctors WHERE hospital_id = 1;
SELECT first_name, last_name, date_of_birth FROM Patients ORDER BY date_of_birth ASC;
SELECT * FROM Patients WHERE gender = 'M' ORDER BY last_name DESC;
SELECT first_name, last_name, date_of_birth FROM Patients WHERE date_of_birth > '1990-01-01' ORDER BY date_of_birth ASC;
SELECT p.first_name, p.last_name, m.diagnosis, m.treatment FROM Patients p INNER JOIN MedicalRecords m ON p.patient_id = m.patient_id ORDER BY m.date_created DESC;
SELECT d.first_name AS doctor_first_name, d.last_name AS doctor_last_name, d.specialty, h.hospital_name FROM Doctors d LEFT JOIN Hospitals h ON d.hospital_id = h.hospital_id;

SELECT p.first_name AS patient_first_name, p.last_name AS patient_last_name, m.diagnosis, m.date_created FROM Patients p JOIN MedicalRecords m ON p.patient_id = m.patient_id WHERE m.treatment IS NOT NULL ORDER BY m.date_created DESC;
SELECT * FROM patients;
SELECT full_name, gender, date_of_birth FROM patients WHERE gender = 'Female';
SELECT full_name, address FROM patients WHERE address LIKE '%Street%';
SELECT * FROM medical_records ORDER BY record_date DESC;
SELECT doctor_id, full_name, specialty FROM doctors ORDER BY full_name ASC;
SELECT full_name, gender, date_of_birth FROM patients WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_patients FROM patients;
SELECT full_name, diagnosis FROM patients JOIN medical_records ON patients.patient_id = medical_records.patient_id ORDER BY diagnosis DESC;
SELECT doctor_id, full_name, specialty, COUNT(*) AS total_appointments FROM doctors JOIN appointments ON doctors.doctor_id = appointments.doctor_id GROUP BY doctor_id;

SELECT patients.full_name, appointments.appointment_date, appointments.appointment_time, appointments.status FROM patients JOIN appointments ON patients.patient_id = appointments.patient_id WHERE appointments.status = 'Scheduled';
SELECT * FROM patients LIMIT 5;
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM patients WHERE gender = 'Female';
SELECT first_name, last_name, date_of_birth FROM patients WHERE health_condition = 'Diabetes' ORDER BY date_of_birth DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE date_of_birth BETWEEN '1980-01-01' AND '1990-12-31';
SELECT first_name, last_name, gender FROM patients ORDER BY last_name, first_name ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM patients ORDER BY last_name DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT first_name, last_name, gender FROM patients WHERE health_condition = 'Diabetes'
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE date_of_birth < '1990-01-01' AND gender = 'Female'
SELECT first_name, last_name, health_condition FROM patients WHERE health_condition LIKE '%Heart%'
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_patients FROM patients
